name: Binance.com Paint It Dark
description: Dark theme for binance.com cryptocurrency exchange with black and greys. Please send any bug reports or change requests using the "Send Feedback" button and I will try to update as soon as possible. Click here to start trading on Binance Visit my website for more projects See also: Bittrex Paint It Dark Kucoin Paint It Dark BTC Tip: 1NenJ5mP4T5gbR9fsoGMDgDzWCiWXypAwG LTC Tip: LeowJ8pxiCsdDx5oBAGYco5sHEfXhpRsgz Doge Tip: DUDQKiB9zFFqFmyx64GuiR6rW9Cxzg1Viu
additional_info:
Version 1.11 - Fix launchpad background
Version 1.10 - Fix info.binance.com background
Version 1.9 - Update Trade History colors
Version 1.8 - Fix OHLC text
Version 1.7 - Fix high low indicator missing on charts, darken depth charts, fix referral page
Version 1.6 - Fix login page 
Version 1.5 - Minor details darkened e.g. dropdown and button colors
Version 1.4 - Fix advanced charts....
Version 1.3 - More dark, more light around charts and order placement areas
Version 1.2 - Fix advanced charts.
Version 1.1 - More black on advanced charts, fix black on small basic chart
Version 1.0 - Initial release, small chart is still a challenge
